author: jwhitlock
msg: Fix some scripting errors when pkg-config doesn't find sqlite3.
* build/ac-macros/sqlite.m4: Only process the findings of pkg-config if found.

author: hwright
msg: Include the sqlite amalgamation in place, rather than copying it to
libsvn_subr.  This should also fix the build error created when building
This is consistent with other things we ship in deps (and people can
always use --with-sqlite to point it somewhere else.
(SVN_SQLITE_FILE_CONFIG): Set the SVN_SQLITE_INCLUDES to include the
Include the amalgamation file directly, and use <> notation so that
gen-make.py doesn't create it as a dependency.

author: hwright
msg: (SVN_LIB_SQLITE): Another followup to r35263: Check standard system locations
for sqlite before going to the amalgamation file.
